mapper.select: select al.alarm_seq, al.type, al.applied_seq, al.reg_date, al.alarm_check, al.email, re.nickname from tb_alarm al full outer join tb_reply re on al.applied_seq = re.reply_seq where type='R' and email= #{email}
select * from tb_alarm al full outer join tb_like lk on al.applied_seq = lk.like_seq where type='L' and email= #{email}

select al.alarm_seq, al.type, al.applied_seq, al.reg_date, al.alarm_check, al.email, fr.from_id from tb_alarm al full outer join tb_friend_request fr on al.applied_seq = fr.friend_seq where type='F' and email=#{email}
mapper.update: update tb_alarm set alarm_check='Y' where email= #{email} and alarm_check='N'
mapper.delete: delete from tb_alarm where email= #{email} and alarm_seq=#{alarm_seq}
